meanings.sent1: The reemergence of the sun after a storm brought warmth back to the land.
meanings.sent2: The reemergence of the butterfly from its cocoon was a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent3: The reemergence of the cat from its hiding spot startled the dog.
meanings.sent4: The reemergence of the stars in the night sky signaled the end of the storm.
meanings.sent5: The sudden reemergence of the missing key in my pocket surprised me.

meanings.definition: The process of coming into view or becoming exposed after being hidden or out of sight.
meanings.sent1: The reemergence of the moon from behind the clouds lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The reemergence of the mountain peak after the fog cleared was breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: The reemergence of the squirrel from its burrow made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: The reemergence of the truth in the investigation shed light on the case.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected reemergence of the old photo brought back fond memories.

meanings.definition: The reappearance or revival of something that was previously present or active.
meanings.sent1: The reemergence of the trend from the 90s in fashion magazines is exciting.
meanings.sent2: The reemergence of the song on the radio brought back nostalgia.
meanings.sent3: The reemergence of the joke at the party made everyone laugh again.
meanings.sent4: The reemergence of the tradition during the holiday season was heartwarming.
meanings.sent5: The sudden reemergence of the old building in the city skyline surprised many.
